mean_en: a situation in which workers stop working for a period of time as a protest
word_etyma: stop阻止 + p + age名词后缀 → stoppage 阻止，阻塞
short_phrase: a work stoppage at the construction site
sentence: Water poured out from the basin because of a stoppage in the pipe.
sentence_trans: 管子被堵住了，水从水槽里面漫出来了。
